title: Trojan Detection Container (ICSI) - The detector using weight and eigen values
technique_description: Extracts model weight statistics and eigen values and trains a gradient boosting classifier.
technique_changes: Adding more datapoints by including the leftover dataset

train_clf_gbm_param-learning_rate.description: How fast the classifier is learning.

train_clf_gbm_param-max_depth.description: The maximum depth of the individual regression estimators.

train_clf_gbm_param-max_features.description: The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

train_clf_gbm_param-min_samples_leaf.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

train_clf_gbm_param-min_samples_split.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

train_clf_gbm_param-subsample.description: How mush the model is learning.
